query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.code,
  p.name,
  p.abcClass,
  p.price as price_cents,
  COALESCE(SUM(i.physicalStock), 0) as total_stock,
  (COALESCE(SUM(i.physicalStock), 0) * p.price / 100) as stock_value_reais
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.id = i.productId
WHERE p.abcClass = 'A'
GROUP BY p.id
ORDER BY stock_value_reais DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.code,
  p.name,
  p.abcClass,
  p.price as price_cents,
  COALESCE(SUM(i.physicalStock), 0) as total_stock,
  (COALESCE(SUM(i.physicalStock), 0) * p.price / 100) as stock_value_reais
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.id = i.productId
WHERE p.abcClass = 'A'
GROUP BY p.id
ORDER BY stock_value_reais DESC
LIMIT 5;
